title: i placed in bronze 1 and won 7 games from 10
body: why riot do that for me i won 7 from 10 games and placed in bronze 1

replies.body:
You ended silver 5 last season, so placing in bronze 1 isn't really that much of a drop.

When season first started you may have noticed the two popups when you logged into your client explaining the "soft reset" and how almost all players will end up placing lower than they ended last season even if they were to win all of their games. 

It's ok though, 7-3 is a pretty good effort, and if you can do that again you will be back in S5 in no time :)
Ah, i'v heard its the first game that hits your elo up or down, but have no solid evidence of course to back it up..
Plat 4 season 7 won 2 lost 8 got placed plat 3 :)))

> [{quoted}](name=MysticLlamaZ,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=Rn9A3ztK,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-01-20T18:53:13.248+0000)
>
> Plat 4 season 7 won 2 lost 8 got placed plat 3 :)))

Did you win your very first game?
Nope I lost 4 then won 2 then lost 4 XD
KEK lost 6 out of 10, ended up silver 2 (silver 3/5 preseason/last season)

Come on man, Riot even gave us TWO popups this year to remind us that you WILL get placed BELOW your ranking from last season.  I get that some people are extra special but all you need is a basic understanding on how to READ.
